column5: Welcome! Cozy upstairs studio apartment in a renovated 100 year old barn with everything you will need. It is located within Historic Smithville on a beautiful 1/2 acre lot. The perfect place to escape and relax and enjoy time in small town Texas. While in Smithville you can shop the antique stores, dine in one of the many great restaurants, or visit Bone Spirits Distillery. It is within 30 minutes of Circuit of The Americas, ABI Airport and antique shopping Round Top. See you soon!
